meanings.definition: The state or quality of being rainy.
meanings.sent1: The raininesses outside made everything wet and slippery.
meanings.sent2: The raininesses in the forecast prompted everyone to bring umbrellas.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they jumped in the raininesses puddles.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds signaled the arrival of intense raininesses.
meanings.sent5: The constant raininesses created a soothing sound on the roof.

meanings.definition: The amount of rain that falls in a particular area or time period.
meanings.sent1: The farmers measured the raininesses to determine crop irrigation needs.
meanings.sent2: The raininesses last night caused some flooding in low-lying areas.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected increase in raininesses caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: The raininesses during the monsoon season were particularly heavy this year.
meanings.sent5: The raininesses gauge showed a record-breaking amount of rainfall.
